about_the_game:
Delve into the first SeraphCircle pixel monsters! Two lovingly packed 256x256 spritesheets containing a wealth of nature-themed creatures for your game. From flies to sylphs to ogres, this pack is as versatile as it is practical!

We hope our creatures help spark that creative light in your mind!

Features:

* Sprites are provided as individual sprites in 5 different scales (1x, 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x), for ease of use in the RPG Maker of your choice.
* Sprites are also provided compacted in 256x256 spritesheets for use in other engines.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
